Purpose:

The Facilities Manager organizes and supervises all of the maintenance staff, cleaning staff, kitchen staff, childcare staff and the security staff to ensure the smooth running of the school site. The facilities manager is responsible for ensuring that the school-site runs efficiently on a day to day basis and plans for the continued upkeep and improvement of the school facility. The facilities manager helps acquire apartments for foreign faculty.

Duties and Responsibilities:

  1. Major Function: Facility Management
    1. Supervising parent dropoff and pick-up.
    2. Preparing the visitor list for the day for the security guards.
    3. Going through the help desk system to identify a facility need.
    4. Walking through the campus to identify maintenance or safety needs.
    5. Ensuring that the kitchen is on task for lunch.
    6. Monitoring and managing the safety camera system.
  2. Major Function: Financial Planning and Purchasing
    1. Identify purchasing needs and communicate them to the School Bursar. 
    2. Obtain quotes from contractors related to facility development. 
  3. Major Function: Personnel Management
    1. Arrange contracts for maintenance, cleaning, security, kitchen, and childcare staff.
    2. Advertise and recruit for additional and replacement staff in these sections. 
    3. Conduct ongoing evaluation of the staff performance. 
    4. Liaise and communicate with the supervisors in each department.
  4. Major Function: Local Authority Communication
    1. Liaise with the local police with regards to any registration needs from the local police station.
    2. Liaise with immediate neighbors as required. 

    Required Characteristics Profile:

    • A person who professes Jesus Christ as Savior and Lord.
    • Able to relate Christian lifestyle and experience to daily life and work. 
    • Strong leadership style with the ability to delegate responsibility. 
    • Supervision experience 
    • Pro-active decision maker 
    • Skill at interpersonal relationships
    • Strong administration and communication skills
    • Values other team members while working in a team style organization. 
    • Has the capacity to think through consequences of actions and understand the effect on others of those actions.
